componentDescription: A versatile component for displaying a collection of content in a rotating sequence with navigation.

children.description: The child elements to be displayed within the carousel, expected as an array of React nodes.

defaultActiveIndex.description: The initial active slide index when the carousel mounts, if not controlled.

activeIndex.description: The currently active slide index, used for controlled components.

onChange.description: Callback function triggered when the active slide changes, receiving the new index.

showNavigation.description: Determines whether navigation buttons (previous/next) should be displayed.

navigationPosition.description: Specifies the position of the navigation buttons within the carousel.

prevButton.description: Custom content or component for the previous navigation button.

nextButton.description: Custom content or component for the next navigation button.

showIndicators.description: Determines whether slide indicators should be displayed.

indicatorPosition.description: Specifies the position of the slide indicators within the carousel.

indicatorVariant.description: Defines the visual style or variant of the slide indicators.

autoPlay.description: Enables or disables automatic slide progression.

autoPlayInterval.description: The duration in milliseconds between automatic slide transitions.

pauseOnHover.description: Pauses auto-play when the user hovers over the carousel.

infinite.description: Enables infinite looping of slides, returning to the beginning after the last slide.

direction.description: Specifies the direction of slide transitions (e.g., 'horizontal' or 'vertical').

transitionDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds for slide transition animations.

stepIndices.description: An optional array of indices that define specific steps or points in the carousel navigation.

views.description: Custom styles to apply to different parts of the carousel component.
